eventItem.description: Join us in celebrating the first anniversary of the Renaissance Pub's grand opening! Enjoy live music from the incredible Kevin Alexander as we mark this special occasion together.

eventItem.name: Farm to Food Truck Hoedown
eventItem.description: Indulge in an evening under the open sky, filled with live music, dancing, and mouthwatering delights from food trucks! You support the food trucks, and we'll handle the rest! Limited seating provided, but feel free to bring your own chairs! Event is on, rain or shine!

eventItem.name: Diamond Dawgs vs. Albany Athletics
eventItem.description: Season opener, tickets are $6 for adults, $5 for students and $4 for our senior citizens.

eventItem.name: Donna Veeder Showcase & Silent Auction
eventItem.description: Donna Veeder was a traveling portrait artist for many years, working at area arts and craft shows. She taught Adult Painting at MVCA for seventeen years. Per Donna's request, her work has been given to the Mohawk Valley Center for the Arts for a silent auction of her work. Don't miss this chance to see her work and take one home with you.

eventItem.name: Dubbonet @ Rock Valley Brewing Co
eventItem.description: Classic Rock band Dubonnet has been rockin the stage for over 30 years! Help us give them a warm Rock Valley welcome!

eventItem.name: Diamond Dawgs vs. Utica Blue Sox
eventItem.description: Tickets are $6 for adults, $5 for students and $4 for our senior citizens.

eventItem.name: Holy Family Parish Festival
eventItem.description: Get ready for a fantastic family festival at Ward Square/Eastern Park, E. Main Street, Little Falls, NY, come rain or shine! (In case of rain, the music moves to the Parish Gym.) Enjoy delicious fare from The Holy Family Food Tent, food trucks, browse through craft vendors, and let the kids have a blast with activities like the bounce house. Plus, groove to live music, participate in raffles, and don't miss tours of our stunning historic church and its intricate stained glass windows.

eventItem.name: 5K Run/Walk
eventItem.description: Join us for the inaugural Holy Family Parish 5K in beautiful Little Falls, NY! This race is part of the larger Holy Family Parish Festival on June 1, 2024, and is being directed in conjunction with Rock City Runners. The race starts at 12 noon and will begin and end at Eastern Park/Ward Square, across the street from Holy Family Parish (formerly St. Mary's) in Little Falls. All runners registered by May 12 at midnight will be guaranteed a race t-shirt in their preferred size. Online registration ends on May 30th at midnight. THERE IS NO DAY-OF REGISTRATION. Runners 16 years old and younger run for $5 (no t-shirt).

Expect a lively atmosphere filled with good vibes, great music, and plenty of fun. Whether you're a fan of classic rock or just looking to enjoy some live music with friends and family, The Posers always deliver.

eventItem.name: Canal Celebration
eventItem.description: For 36 years running, the Annual Canal Celebration has been a testament to our community's spirit, heritage, and the special essence that sets Little Falls apart in the Mohawk Valley. Drawing in thousands of visitors, this week-long event features a myriad of family-friendly programs. None of this would be possible without the hard work of over a hundred individuals from local organizations, businesses, industries, and the City of Little Falls employees, all coming together to make it happen.

eventItem.name: Rock on the Mohawk
eventItem.description: Come soak up the summer vibes along the picturesque Erie Canal! Jam out to tunes from talented local musicians, browse through unique creations from artisans and vendors, indulge in tasty treats, and most importantly, cherish moments with neighbors and friends. In loving memory of Gregg Caringi.

eventItem.name: Garlic & Herb Festival
eventItem.description: The Mohawk Valley boasts an ideal climate and soil for cultivating garlic and herbs, leading to a plethora of local producers. Our festival is a non-profit endeavor focused on promoting these crops, offering valuable insights to aspiring farmers and gardeners in the area. Additionally, we celebrate our community's rich arts scene by featuring musicians and local artisans. A portion of our proceeds goes to support the Mohawk Valley Center for the Arts, our esteemed neighbor and local non-profit.

eventItem.name: Cheese Festival
eventItem.description: Welcome to the ultimate gathering of cheesemakers in New York State! Join us in celebrating the vibrant dairy heritage of Central New York and honoring the local businesses that uphold these time-honored traditions. Explore a delightful array of over 120 cheeses, along with handcrafted artisan foods and refreshing craft beverages, all proudly made right here in our region!

eventItem.name: Halloween in Little Falls
eventItem.description: Halloween in Little Falls is a festive and family-friendly affair that attracts folks of all ages from near and far. It's a night filled with catching up with friends, enjoying family outings, admiring the spooky decorations, and fostering a strong sense of community spirit throughout the city.

eventItem.name: Rock the Holidays
eventItem.description: Experience the magic of Christmas in Little Falls, a festive holiday celebration brought to you by local businesses and non-profit organizations. Our array of enjoyable, mostly free events have delighted thousands of visitors from across the Mohawk Valley, inviting everyone to immerse themselves in the holiday cheer of our charming, scenic town nestled along the Erie Canal.
